name: REFERRAL_CE_PX
description: This audit table stores the Care Everywhere Procedures.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_PX_MODIFIERS
columns.description: Stores a comma delimited list of procedure modifiers. This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.

columns.name: AUDIT_PX_REVENUE_CODE
columns.description: Stores the revenue code associated for a procedure associated with the referral. This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.

columns.name: AUDIT_PX_REQUESTED_UNITS
columns.description: Stores the requested number of units for a procedure associated with the referral. This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.

columns.name: AUDIT_PX_APPROVED_UNITS
columns.description: Stores the approved number of units for a procedure associated with the referral. This item is used to audit data from incoming Care Everywhere referrals.
